snippet: His criticism of the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter, posted on Twitter, continued a pattern in which the president-elect has targeted businesses for criticism and threatened presidential action....

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, CHRISTOPHER DREW and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, Christopher Drew from New York and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: His criticism of the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter, posted on Twitter, continued a pattern in which the president-elect has targeted businesses for criticism and threatened presidential action.

headline.main: Trump Joins Line of Critics of Costly Fighter Jet
headline.print_headline: Trump Is the Latest Critic of F-35 Jet Whose Costs Spiraled ‘Out of Control’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
